content.raw: As we talked earlier, there is an issue with Ubuntu Xenial + Unity which prevents menubar action shortcuts from being triggered. On Gazebo, the [temporary solution](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2602/dont-use-native-menus-fix-issue-2134/diff) was to have 2 menus, a native one and an extra one, so the actions are registered. Here, let's try using standalone shortcuts instead and see if this causes issues on other platforms in the future. The downside is that standalone shortcuts don't show up on the menu nest to the action text.
